entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
